pr_title: Extract export database logic into own class

timeline.message:
Extract export database logic into own class

- Separate it from the UI.
- Add happy path unit test.

Extract export database logic into own class

- Separate it from the UI.
- Add happy path unit test.

timeline.bodyText: Well from refactoring too much stuff around, i apparently created a beforeClass method annotated @Before. I'll fix this later on in my next PR.
timeline.author: XiangRongLin
timeline.diffHunk:
